entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 9:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
